channel.title: Standalone Project on AI With Shoaib
channel.description: Recent content in Standalone Project on AI With Shoaib

item.title: tAI - Get Terminal Commands Using Natural Language
item.description: tAI is a simple command line utility tool built on top of Python. Which can generate any commands based on natural language.

item.title: How We Created First Bangla Reasoning Dataset
item.description: Time to deep dive to find out how to build a synthetic Bangla reasoning dataset using DeepSeek-r1

item.title: Transcribing Bangla Youtube Video With Gemini
item.description: Let’s build a Bangla Youtube Transcriber using Google’s new Gemini Flash 2.
